about_the_game:
The one and only College Bound saga continues with Episode 4!

Fasten your seat belts and make sure you're alone in the room because FOZ presents you with the latest part of College Bound - Episode 4 is out now! The fourth chapter of College Bound has much more content, images, and animations than ever before...and even the addition of sex sounds!

What story arcs are included in this DLC?

You'll be presented with numerous crucial choices including whether or not to testify against Miranda or let her run free. There are also more casual decisions to be made, such as whether should you help stuck Lynda get out of the washing machine or take advantage of a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. Play your cards right and the reward will be...well...worth it. Apart from that, you'll have a chance to visit Sina at her house far away from the city, bear witness to the last straw between Jess and Matt, go on a tropical vacation to the island of Moanui with Blanca, have a workout of a lifetime with Amber, fly to the moon and...uh...the list goes on and on, but no more spoilers. Get the Episode 4 DLC now to have some well-deserved fun and to check out all the naughty, serious, light-hearted, hilarious, or surprising events prepared just for you!

It's Getting Hot in Here - Sex Scenes


Episode 4 is full of high-quality sex scenes made with a passion as intense as that between the onscreen characters. There are over 95 new animations in the latest DLC. Some of the sex scenes you can take part in include: join a threesome with two stunning milfs - Jess and Lynda - as well as two hot teens - Blanca and Summer; dominate Sina in a hot BDSM session; have a very personal workout with Amber; check the durability of Matt's office desk with Jess; make a photoshoot with Lisa take a turn to the lewd; find out that Tracy has hobbies other than books; pick between the two fiery Latinas - Mia or Lucia; and even spend some quality time with Shanice when you discover other uses for the beach besides sunbathing.

Doesn't that sound great? But wait, there's more!

In addition to the scenes listed above, get ready to see Aisha, Miranda, Blanca, Jess, Summer, and Lynda in action, among others. As if that wasn't enough, there are now hot sound effects and advanced breasts physics which make the jiggle jiggle effect more realistic. Episode 4 takes College Bound realism to the next level!

Detailed and Advanced Visuals

Major hardware upgrades since previous episodes have delivered much more detailed renders, with more lights, effects, and often, more characters in a frame. The visual component of the story is much easier on the eye compared to previous episodes, so if you want to see your favorite College Bound characters in more visually appealing scenes, this DLC is for you!

There are almost 2x more images than in the previous episode (more than 2600 now) and approximately 3x more animations (96 animation files). Apart from the visual side, the story is also longer - this Episode is a sum of 24 weekly releases, which is a major improvement compared to Episode 3 which had 15. Enjoy the addition of various sound effects (not only those used in sex scenes, but throughout the episode), and enjoy new graphical elements such as animated presentation clips of the locations.

Try College Bound Episode 4 today and have the best college experience possible!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game graphically depicts sex and includes mature themes such as drug use and elements of blackmail. While most of the story is light-hearted, parts of it may be problematic for some individuals, especially those easily offended. Please consider this before playing College Bound. Outside of that, have fun and enjoy the ride! All of the scenes are animated, well developed and written to add to the story and the enjoyment of our players.

All characters depicted are at least 21 years of age or older and all sexual acts are consensual.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: College Bound - Episode 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Fasten your seatbelts and check if you are alone in the room because FOZ presents you with a brand new part of College Bound - Episode 4 is out now! The fourth part of the engaging adult game has way more content, images, sex scenes (now with sounds), and animations than ever before!
